edu.jhu.cs.wilkes.cs335.assignment4.traditional

Class DecisionTreeNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.jhu.cs.wilkes.cs335.assignment4.traditional.DecisionTreeNode

  • public class DecisionTreeNode
extends java.lang.Object
    Class which makes up the decision tree, and handles the creation of the tree, as well as classification of cases.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DecisionTreeNode(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> remainingAttributes, DecisionTreeNode parent, java.util.List<CaseForClassification> toBeClassified)
      Constructor for a decision tree node.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DecisionTreeNode

        public DecisionTreeNode(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> remainingAttributes,
                DecisionTreeNode parent,
                java.util.List<CaseForClassification> toBeClassified)
        Constructor for a decision tree node.
        Parameters:
        decisionNumber - the attribute index to be used
        remainingAttributes - the list containing all the other attribute indices which are unused
        parent - the node which created this node
        toBeClassified - the cases which reach this decision node.
